description: A series of mysterious thefts have plagued the coastal town of Nice, France. As the holiday season approaches, the thefts escalate, leaving the local authorities baffled. Your mission is to uncover the identity of the mastermind behind these crimes before they vanish into the night. Follow the clues hidden in the whispers of the townsfolk and the shadows of the streets.

reasoning_chain: Isabelle Roche is the only suspect with red hair and a hobby of sketching, matching the clues.
The red bicycle aligns with the visual clues about the getaway vehicle.
Her motive of frustration over lack of recognition fits the context of the thefts.
Other suspects do not match all traits or motives as closely as Isabelle.

solution: Connect the clues about the red bicycle and the artist's frustration to identify Isabelle as the mastermind.
